messages.subject: Re: 2242 to Beth
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/14/02 8:38 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... To Beth: There s a difference between genius and stupidity: Genius has an end, but there s no end
messages.messageBody:
on 8/14/02 8:38 AM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>
> MY neighbor told me her 6 yr old had 14 pages of work today, on the 2nd day
> of school. My question was if he enjoyed it. She said evidently....but
> why??? Why would a very active little boy enjoy sitting and working on
> paper? and then get home to have mom tell him his m's were sloppy and needed
> to practice those and vocabulary for another hour....I simply don' t get
> it:(
>
> Beth-Shawn and Shannon's mommy

To Beth:
There's a difference between genius and stupidity: Genius has an end, but
there's no end to stupidity.

When there come to be enough people who think as you do, some of the
stupidity will stop and education will change.

Ned
